sentences.en: As these electrons are negatively charged they will attempt to repel each other.
sentences.cn: 因为这些电子都带负电，它们将会互相排斥。

sentences.en: Like charges repel each other , unlike charges attract.
sentences.cn: 同性电荷相斥,异性电荷相吸.

sentences.en: Like charges repel each other, but opposite charges attract.
sentences.cn: 同种电荷互相排斥, 但异种电荷却互相吸引.

sentences.en: Like charges repel each other, unlike charges attract each other.
sentences.cn: 同性电荷互相排斥, 异性电荷互相吸引.

sentences.en: Like poles repel, unlike poles attract.
Molecules repel each other when they collide.
sentences.cn: 当分子相碰撞时彼此互斥.

sentences.en: Opposite poles attract, like poles repel.
sentences.cn: 相反两个磁极互相吸引, 相同两个磁极则互相排斥.

sentences.en: Particles with similar electric charges repel each other.
sentences.cn: 电荷同性的分子互相排斥.
蜘蛛和蚯蚓使我感到厌恶.

sentences.en: The army was ready to repel an attack.
sentences.cn: 军队已准备好击退进攻。

sentences.en: The negative poles of two magnets will repel each other.
sentences.cn: 两块磁铁的负极相互排斥.

sentences.en: They prepared to repel the invaders.
Two like electric charges repel each other.
Two negative charges repel each other , and so do two positive charges.
sentences.cn: 两个负电荷相斥,每个正电荷也是如此.

sentences.en: We derive the important law: opposite charges attract , like charges repel.
sentences.cn: 我们得到的重要定律是: 异电相吸,同电相斥.

trans.tran_en: if something repels you, it is so unpleasant that you do not want to be near it, or it makes you feel ill

trans.tran_cn: 击退，使厌恶，抵制，使不愉快，排斥，（磁极间） 相斥
trans.tran_en: if something repels you, it is so unpleasant that you do not want to be near it, or it makes you feel ill
